title: Emerald Diamond Floral Cascade Earrings - "Aakarshana Kundanalu"
materials: G Color). Crafted with expert 'Kundan' setting around the Emeralds.
features: Exquisite floral motifs with cascading diamond petals. Each emerald is meticulously set within a Kundan-style border, adding a touch of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship to a contemporary design. The floral cascade creates a dynamic sense of movement and light.
colors: and subtle hints of Yellow Gold around the Emerald settings.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Can be paired beautifully with a silk saree or a modern evening gown. Suitable for formal events and festive celebrations such as Diwali or Ugadi.
description: These earrings are a harmonious blend of modern design and traditional craftsmanship. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, while the diamonds represent eternal love. The delicate floral design evokes a sense of femininity and grace. The quality of the gemstones ensures lasting brilliance and value.
